    • Method Detail

      • testIteratorEmptyFloorplan

        public final void testIteratorEmptyFloorplan()
        Test case: See if iterator works on floorplan with no wallboards

        Method under test: iterator

        If there are no wallboards, iterator should provide no sequences. Test uses fixed width and height but iterates through all positions on the maze and exercises all directions.

      • testIteratorFloorplanAllWallsUp

        public final void testIteratorFloorplanAllWallsUp()
        Test case: See if iterator works on floorplan with all wallboards up

        Method under test: iterator

        If all wallboards are up, iterator should return sequences of length 1 because we hit a crossing wallboard after each step. Test uses fixed width and height but iterates through all positions on the maze and exercises all directions.

      • isSequenceOfVerticalWalls

        private void isSequenceOfVerticalWalls(Floorplan floorplan,
                                       CardinalDirection cdBlocked,
                                       int limit,
                                       CardinalDirection cd,
                                       int x,
                                       int[] seq)
        Checks if the given interval seq describes a continuous sequence of wallboards
        Parameters:
        floorplan - that carry the wallboards
        cdBlocked - the direction we could see a blocking wallboard (perpendicular)
        limit - the max value for the end position for the y coordinate
        cd - the direction we expect to have a wallboard
        x - coordinate, the column in floorplan
        seq - gives two y coordinate values, start and end

      • isSequenceOfHorizontalWalls

        private void isSequenceOfHorizontalWalls(Floorplan floorplan,
                                         CardinalDirection cdBlocked,
                                         int limit,
                                         CardinalDirection cd,
                                         int y,
                                         int[] seq)
        Checks if the given interval seq describes a continuous sequence of wallboards
        Parameters:
        floorplan - carries the wallboards
        cdBlocked - the direction we could see a blocking wallboard (perpendicular)
        limit - the max value for the end position for the y coordinate
        cd - the direction we expect to have a wallboard
        y - coordinate, the row in floorplan
        seq - gives two x coordinate values, start and end

      • testIteratorFloorplanAllSequencesSameVertical

        public final void testIteratorFloorplanAllSequencesSameVertical()
        Test case: See if iterator works on floorplan with sequences of same length

        Method under test: iterator

        Test starts with a cell where all wallboards are up and then deletes wallboards in a regular manner such that all sequence should be at the same fixed length. The gap between sequences is always of same length as well. Test uses fixed width and height but iterates through all positions on the maze and exercises all directions.
